MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SK9 and WA16 postcode areas of Alderley Edge and Knutsford, affecting properties in Sandlebridge Rise, Mill Lane, Pinfold Lane and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:00PM on 26th October 2020.
